Message:
The fog here has grown thicker.
It is not uncommon for
fog to appear at a lakeside,

but on a day like this,
at such an hour...

...Wait... I feel a magical force
mingled with this fog.

If I remember correctly,
Sabrina said she was
assailed by illusions.
If this were the same
magical force...

Ophelia is likely to
berate me again for
plunging into danger alone,

but now is not the time
to be hesitating.
I must hurry and find Nina.
